# myutil

 # Usage
 ```
 #### Generate automatic docs/stats
 cd yourrepo
 doc-gen   --prefix   https://github.com/arita37/yourepo/tree/main/
 
 
 
 ```
 


# myutil
    https://pypi.org/project/utilmy/#history


## Install

    pip install utilmy 

    git clone  https://github.com/arita37/myutil.git
    cd myutil
    pip install -e .
